description.about: Azolve is a leading business application provider, working with a wide range of sports governing bodies, membership associations, commercial businesses, government organizations and education providers.
points: Debug and optimize existing codes & Follow strict coding Standards
Writing complex sql queries, building rich UI components with JavaScript (in Azolve's own JS framework: Astral)
Writing client side scripts for managing business logic and timely delivery of projects.
Working with Azolve's expense, invoicing and process costing
Have been working for its promising membership solution GoMembershp

description.about: I had been the lead coordinator for the project. It is a workshop which includes a certification examination. The workshop had been designed for the web developers.
points: Engaging with users to build Developer relationships with the community and encourage engagement
Organize Problem oriented Events with Google technology that solve local problems for Bangladeshi community.
Have been working for its promising membership solution GoMembershp

description.about: It is a training program launched by Daffodil International University for their students. I had been the lead trainer for one session.
points: Manage training related plans and programs
Engaging with trainees with their projects

description.about: To help leading the course on “Object Oriented Programming” and “Wireless Programming” with the teacher assigned to the course.
points: Helping teachers on classes and labs.
To take classes and labs in absence of the teacher
